akn:section.akn:heading: Quarters: Nurse Corps officers; assignment in hospitals

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 8777. Quarters: Nurse Corps officers; assignment in hospitals Under such regulations as the Secretary of the Navy prescribes, officers in the Nurse Corps may be assigned quarters in naval hospitals. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 469, § 7577; renumbered § 8777, Pub. L. 115–232, div. A, title VIII, § 807(d)(9), Aug. 13, 2018, 132 Stat. 1837.)
